{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=Meraki MR18 |revision=-HW (600-26010) |asin=B00KK93Q5C |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |fcc_date=12/11/2013 |fcc_id=UDX-60026010 |ic_id=6961A-60026010 |pcb_id=7016A0670004 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af/at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, EJTAG 1.2,, J5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9582;AR9582-AR1A; |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR9582;AR9582-AR1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP15B;;2;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;1;,,, 3 Channel 16bit PWM Constant Current Driver;Numen Tech;NU801;;1;,,, 4.1A 150V N-Channel MOSFET;ON Semiconductor;FDS86242;;1;,,, 400V 30A Single-Phase Bridge Rectifier;Vishay Silicon;B4S;;2;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Silicon;Si4850EY;;2;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-816;;1; |flags=PoE in |stock_boot=Meraki Atheros LinuxLoader |stock_os=Linux;3.4.80; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=00:18:0A |oui_eth=00:18:0A }} {{TagLine|Meraki MR18 Cloud Managed AP (MR18-HW)}} :[https://meraki.cisco.com/products/wireless/mr18 Product page] This is a three radio device (11b/g/n, 11a/n, 11a/b/g/n [Air Marshall] ?) :It would ''appear'' to be using [[Atheros]] silicon ([[Senao CAP4200AG]] ?) The FCC EUT has a MAC address starting with 00:18:0A. It's presumed to be used. ===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/meraki/mr18 On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware
Architecture: MIPS
Vendor: Atheros/Qualcomm
System-On-Chip: Atheros/Qualcomm QCA9557-AT4A
CPU Speed: 720MHz
Flash size: Hynix 128MiB NAND
RAM: 2x Unknown DDR2 64MiB
Wireless: SoC AR9550 + 2x Atheros AR9582-AR1A
Switch: None
Ethernet port: 1x Gigabit AR8035-A, 802.3af PoE capable
USB: No
Serial: Yes, 115200 8N1, left to right: VCC/RX/TX/GND
JTAG: Yes, EJTAG 1.2
Bootloader: nandloader (Cisco made)
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=59248 ''Cisco Meraki MR18 Support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] ==Images== File:Cisco Meraki MR18 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Cisco Meraki MR18 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- __NOTOC__ [[Category:Meraki]]
